question: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to release a commemorative coin of Rs 75 denomination, marking which event?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to release a commemorative coin of Rs 75 denomination marking the 75th Anniversary of Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) on 16th October 2020.
The coin would mark the long-standing relationship between of India and FAO. Indiaâ€™s proposals for the International Year of Pulses in 2016 and the International Year of Millets 2023 have been endorsed by FAO.
